triggers.description: The UPS charge is less than {$UPS.CHARGE.CRITICAL.LIMIT}%

triggers.name: [{$UPS_NAME}] The UPS CHARGE is less than {$UPS.CHARGE.WARNING.LIMIT}%
triggers.description: The UPS charge is less than {$UPS.CHARGE.WARNING.LIMIT}%

dependencies.name: [{$UPS_NAME}] The UPS CHARGE is less than {$UPS.CHARGE.CRITICAL.LIMIT}%

triggers.name: [{$UPS_NAME}] The UPS LOAD is higher than {$UPS.LOAD.CRITICAL.LIMIT}%
triggers.description: The UPS load is higher than {$UPS.LOAD.CRITICAL.LIMIT}%

triggers.name: [{$UPS_NAME}] The UPS LOAD is higher than {$UPS.LOAD.WARNING.LIMIT}%
triggers.description: The UPS load is higher than {$UPS.LOAD.WARNING.LIMIT}%

dependencies.name: [{$UPS_NAME}] The UPS LOAD is higher than {$UPS.LOAD.CRITICAL.LIMIT}%

items.name: UPS Average output Watts last hour

triggers.name: [{$UPS_NAME}] The UPS reports that is On Battery and Discharging
triggers.description:
UPS status = OB or OB DISCHRG
On Battery. The UPS is taking energy from its battery. The battery is discharging.

triggers.name: [{$UPS_NAME}] The UPS reports that is On Line and charging the battery
triggers.description:
UPS status = OL CHRG
On Line. The UPS is charging the battery

triggers.name: [{$UPS_NAME}] The UPS reports that the battery should be replaced
triggers.description:
UPS status = RB 
Replace battery. The UPS reports that its battery or batteries should be replaced.
